description: If the system configuration is changed in given time

Summary.eval: ($v2==2) ? 'NAP neighbor connection established successfully' : (($v2==4) ? 'NAP neighbor connection interrupted abnormally due to $v3' :'NAP neighbor connection status: $v2')

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapStatusNotify HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapLocalPortName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborStatus i 4 HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborAbnormalReason i 1
$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapStatusNotify HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapLocalPortName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborStatus i 2 HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborAbnormalReason i 3
$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapStatusNotify HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapLocalPortName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborStatus i 1 HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborAbnormalReason i 0

description: The local port name of nap neighbor.
variables.name: HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapLocalPortName

description: The abnormal reason for nap neighbor.
variables.name: HUAWEI-NAP-MIB::hwNapNeighborAbnormalReason
